title: Caught in the Devil's Hand
description: Magic has bound her to a demon. But love could set them free.Shumei's small village shuns her for the magic that runs in her family. She and her family scrape by providing herbal cures, but when an epidemic depletes her stores, she is forced to leave the protection of town.Demons roam the woods at night, and Shumei falls into the hands of a handsome man...who isn't really human. Little does she know that the deal she makes with him to escape his clutches will unlock her potential, her destiny...and her heart.Fall in love all over again with the second-edition release of Caught in the Devil's Hand. Rediscover the legacy of the Dark Court and enjoy improved readability, snappier dialogue, hotter love scenes, and tighter narration.
author: Ruby Duvall
